caption: Wasn't a huge fan of the food. Came here because we were told it was really good italian... whenever I hear that I have high expectations and this place didn't cut it. I would say the food was good, slightly above average and the service …
Amazing service and outstanding food. Homemade pasta 5 stars

Hands down one of the best places in town for Italian. The family has been in the restaurant business for 3 generations. So they know their way around a kitchen. You won't be disappointed. Oh and they definitely know their audience! Haha
Had family over 2/28/2021 & ordered the Chicken Francese.  The best I ever had!  Everyone Loved it & made sure I would post our enjoyment of this dish!!❤️!  Thank you!
Food was fabulous!!! Felt a little rushed which does not make for the most ideal dinner experience.
The best in Saratoga!
best place to eat in Capital district

Solevo’s was delicious! We had a reservation for Friday evening and they got us seated right away and we didn’t wait long for our meals. The chicken parm and Sunday sauce were so yummy and I absolutely LOVED the lemoncello dessert cake. Definitely come here!
Decided to take my husband out to dinner somewhere nice. This place has a nice vibe. We didn’t mind the noise. Food and service was pretty bad.
The place is overhyped. I wouldn’t recommend anyone going.

We absolutely LOVE this restaurant!!!! Starting from the ambience to the waitstaff, to the amazing food (do NOT miss the eggplant chips or the fried mozzarella)...this family owned business brings so much life, love and joy to Italian food …

I have been here multiple times but was disappointed at the nickle and diming tonight. We went with our friends and had a $360 meal but was charged $4 for changing a pasta. It is offensive- not the money but the principle. I've been there three times the last month but will go elsewhere the next couple times.
The food is good, reasonably priced. Wait staff was nice. Pasta is handmade, chicken parm was a good size.
Quite simply the best single pasta dish I've had in America. Listen to whatever your waiter recommends, you won't regret it.
Wonderful food! Hostesses not so friendly. Waiter was excellent.
Very good service and staff. Large portions.
The food is so good here would highly recommend.

Could not wait to try Solevo!  Unfortunately, it does not live up to the hype.  We wanted to eat at the bar so we asked the hostess how long it would be for 2 seats there.  She pointed to a couple who had just gotten their dinner, and told …
Outstanding food and service!!! Definitely a new favorite!!
Always great food and service

AMAZING!! The best place in Toga by far!! The food is homemade and delicious. And the drinks always on point. Wait staff makes you feel part of the family and that is bc the owners bring everyone into their home every night. Well done!! Highly recommend!!  ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Great food. Sat at bar.
We found a Great Atmosphere, friendly staff and Incredible food .How have we not gone sooner . Highly recommend

Obsessed. Is the owner the chef? There is so much thought in these dishes and week after week never an issue or flaw. Scamponi is my go to...lasagna is....perfect...chicken parm can feed a family..specials are always delicious. Meatballs out of this world and the beet app is my go to. Keep it up guys!

I had a delicious dinner. I ordered chicken marsala it was delicious. My husband ordered spaghetti with clam sauce unfortunately it was very spicy. It should say that on the menu but it didn’t so he wasn’t that happy. Drinks were very good. …
Wonderful food and gracious hospitality!

We had the chance to sit outside this evening. The food was amazing as always! The best part, feeling like you are enjoying your meal in a European country. If you cannot travel this summer, this is definitely the next best thing! #supportyourlocalrestaurants

There are a few really good "Italian" restaurants in Saratoga.  Solevo, however, is excellence.  So much fresh food, like their homemade pastas, sauces, bread and meatballs, at a price that's well worth the value.  My wife and I have tried …
After eating here I can never visit Olive Garden again. Customer service is outstanding they go above and beyond. A must if your visiting the city.

I went on Friday right as outdoor dining was permitted again. While the restaurant didn’t seem like they had a designated patio, you can see their efforts of pulling together an outdoor dining attempt with short notice... and did they …

I'm here to let you know that Solevo Kitchen & Social is *perfect* it is HANDS DOWN the most incredible restaurant of all time. The food, the atmosphere, the service, the menu—the BATHROOMS (spoiler alert they play music videos! dinner AND …

Absolutely unbelievable. If you think there’s only so much you can do to reinvent the wheel w Italian food, you’re dead wrong. I definitely was. The things these people can do with food is magic. Solevo Kitchen & Social is probably in the …
Fantastic food and service
The wait staff the owners are absolutely magnificent A great compliment to  They're wonderful food
Food was very good but seating can be a little tight and noisey. What did stand out was the superb service and attention that we received. Would definitely go back.
Excellent
Delicious!!!
The service was great! The food was great! The atmosphere is comfortable and cozy. The only shortcoming is if you're not an Italian food lover, then the menu may seem limited.
Excellent food. I want the seafood salad on the menu!!!! Not just as a Christmas special. Please!!!
Small and intimate setting.. hand made pasta, prices are not low but food is amazing
Derek and Glenn behind the bar were great. Loved their happy hour aperitivo plate. Egg plant chips were outstanding. Will certainly be back
Overpriced, typical snooty Saratoga management. Another one of those places that would be "Meh" in a larger city, that thinks they're better than they are. Much better Restaurants in town.

5 star for: Eggplant, calamari, octopus apps delicious.   Steak done perfectly, meatballs like g-ma's.  Wine selection perfect for the meal.  A 4star bc of parking.  Zero stat for Saratoga- parking- Figure it out Saratoga! Please.
Best pasta I've had outside Italy and I've never been to Italy.

AMAZING!! THANK YOU!  The food here is so good.  You feel like you are having dinner at a friend's house. You really feel the family vibe.  The service was top notch.  Very attentive. Sam was a great server!!  I am extremely impressed by …
Authentic Italian dishes done right
Absolutely phenomenal.  The food here is exceptional.  Steve the bartender was fantastic.
Great food
Great food and great service along with delicious food.
GREAT GREAT GREAT ITALIAN RESTAURANT! 6 in our party from appetizers to desserts, no one was disappointed! Do yourself a favor and JUST GO. You will not regret it👍🏻👍🏻
Great food. Great atmosphere. Knowledgeable staff. Definitely a new favorite for us.
Great food and service

Wow!  Best meatballs, pasta Bolognese, greens and beans, salmon.....just try to it. Soooo good. The bathroom is also the cleanest I've ever seen at a restaurant. You know what that means for the kitchen!
Amazing food. Attentive staff. Can't wait to go back and try something else.
Small restaurant with the best Italian food In a long time. Suggest you make reservations. Knowledgeable and very friendly staff.
Amazing food,  service and ambience. One of the best restaurants I've ever been to.

Everything was delicious,  our server was attentive. However, one person in our party didn't care for her meal. The beef bracciole had a lot of fat around the edges and the meatballs were not to her liking. It happens. She really didn't …
Quality and freshness of this food was remarkable.  Servers were a little green but did not affect our experience so 5 stats yes!
Amazing food,drink,service and atmosphere. Perfect night out with family.

We were visiting town and took an Uber and the driver is the one that recommended this restaurant. Very nice decor with outdoor seating. Nice wine menu. Interesting food menu, with everything homemade. Prices are a little on the higher …
Service is good, but the food isn't anything special.

This resturant was referred to me by a woman in lake george.  Very happy I brought my girlfriend here because the food was sooo good!  Im from buffalo ny (a food city) and I can assure you this place is top notch!
Incredible food, knowledgeable and prompt waitstaff, great music and atmosphere, and did I mention the food is incredible?
Great service, great menu, great wine list. Just go

Okay, it's hard to believe. You know when your return experience is often a let down from what you remember? Not so for Solevo. Even better--if that's even possible--than the last time! My friend and I dined there last week. Since we were …

Great atmosphere followed by a spectacular meal!!  The eggplant chips came recommended and did not disappoint(the honey and chili flake combo is awesome).  The balsamic beet salad was fresh and flavorful in a way that brought me back to …

Really not impressed at all with this place. Tried it with my family because we were told it was good food. All of us were very dissatisfied with the food, from the salad to the main course. Most of us didn't even eat it, for the price we …
Fantastic food. You have to try the eggplant chips because they are not what you are expecting. Lovely appetizers, delicious food, and some really unusual crafted cocktails.
OMG...that is it.... Wow!!!
Nice... but small with different Italian style.  Kinda like northern Italian style. Not like Sunday at grandma's but ...ok

Wow! The food was so good! I had a seafood appetizer with shrimp, calamari, artichoke and scallops. The shrimp and scallops we're mouth watering. I had lobster spaghetti and it was cool chuck full of large pieces of lobster in a creamy …
Great Italian experience, great staff, and amazing food.
Ordered take out, some of the best pasta I have had.
Good service, great food, nice ambiance, and a variety of delicious wines.
Amazing little Italian restaurant run by a nice Italian family!
Homestyle Italian (Gramma's) kitchen.  None better!

Excellent!!! The best homemade pasta by far since ive been to italy and they just use dry pasta so by far the best in the world...... specials are outstanding!!!! Top shelf drinks are insanely tasteful!!!! I e passed the word around and …
The food was very good!! The drinks were good i would give it a yes!!!
Great Italian food.  Friendly environment.
Great cosmopolitan atmosphere, good food, excellent service.   Good energy.  It’s the “happening” place in Saratoga right now (spring 2019) and it’s easy to see why.
Incredible, food and service !!! We will definitely be back.

Went here during restraunt week in Saratoga.  The ladies in the corner were a little loud, but it was restraunt week.  Service was great and very attentive.  Food was great.  I had the Bolognese and my wife had the salmon.  Yum.
Wow! What a great place-from before dinner drinks to dessert. This is like being at your nana’s house for dinner! Wonderful atmosphere, great people. Nice new addition to Saraotga
I'm not sure what was better, the food or the service!  I had the scallop pasta special, it was to die for!

My family had a great meal at Solevo. The eggplants chips were phenomenal and I highly recommend them. I was very impressed with the generous portion of lobster in the lobster pasta dish. Most places give you little tiny bits of lobster but …
Zuppa di pesce in white sauce is a delicious broth loaded with seafood
Super, super good. The eggplant chips were awesome!
Quaint place with great food
Amazing Italian food with delicious pasta. The cocktails are on point. Service was great even when it is very busy. Our server Rocky was amazing. We will definitely be coming back.
Great food, atmosphere, and service. I will be back.
This place is the real deal. The food was EXCELLENT and the service was friendly and attentive. My only grief is that I'm from out of town and can't go here all the time. Seriously, it's THAT good.

I can't say enough about this place!! I have been to Solevo several times since it opened this past year. I can honestly say it is my favorite place to go! The food and menu they have put together stands alone at the top, and Giovannina and …
Absolutely delicious!

My wife and I had dinner tonight at this TOP NOTCH restaurant, all I can say is  this place is the BEST NEW RESTAURANT to open up in this city in years. Solevo kitchen will be around for a very long time, great appetizers with great …
First visit 3 weeks ago was so good we went back last night.  Food is simply delicious.  Service is friendly and efficient.  Looking forward to our next visit.
Loved it

The food was very good and not too expensive, on the whole.  Service was excellent and they didn't over-interrupt the meal. My only negative feedback is the cost of a glass of wine: two glasses cost us $20.  Pretty outrageous!  All of …

We’ve been here now several times since they opened and every time has been stellar! While the restaurant atmosphere is cozy and classic, the food and service is on point. If you’re looking for old school Italian cuisine and classic …
Service was excellent food was delicious and was excellent owners very nice very accommodating would recommend anyone to go you won't regret it
5☆ old school authentic Italian at it's best, the Sunday sauce is amazing!! The decor is beautiful and the staff is awesome!!

Tonight was our first time eating at Solevo. I brought my uncle and his partner who live in Manhattan, so bringing them out to eat is always high stakes, as they are used to the best quality restaurants. They exceeded our expectations, …
Pleasant upscale Italian. So many more dishes to try.

Walked in with reservations 10 minutes early, tried to get a drink at the bar, got tired of waiting for the bartender to ask me for my order and decided to wait until I got to our table. At the smallish table we were at was under serviced …

My wife and I have already eaten at this terrific restaurant several times, even though it has only been open for about a month.  We love the "old-style" Italian dishes and the sides, like sauteed spinach.  It is a fantastic restaurant, the …

The Chicken Parm Dinner and meatballs are some of the best I have ever had! You won't find better Chicken Parm in all of the capital district and It even goes toe to toe with some of the greats in NYC. Great bar for a glass a wine and fast take out.

We've eaten here twice already in the short time Solevo has been open and we love it! Everything from the stylish decor to the delicious food and great service. Solevo is a welcome addition to Saratoga!

i visited solevo kitchen recently with a large party including a rather small child. we were greeted by ‘G’, the owner, and she had the hi-chair and table ready for us when we arrived which already made us feel important. the atmosphere, …

Amazing! Can’t wait to go back !
Fresh food and atmosphere. Excellent service!
We celebrated my son's 30th birthday at Solveo Kitchen on Saturday night.  The food and the service were outstanding .  Great atmosphere.  I would highly recommend.
